resources.string: You have successfully bound, this is your current bound cell phone number
Cell phone area code cannot be empty
Cell phone number cannot be empty
Wrong format of cell phone number
You do not have an account, please login first！

Dear Player, 
We've detected refund activity on your account. To ensure your account security and maintain a fair gaming environment, please contact our in-game customer support within 24 hours of receiving this notice for verification and resolution. 

Failure to reach out and confirm within the specified timeframe may result in account suspension until the matter is resolved. 

We appreciate your understanding and cooperation.

Dear Player, 

Your account has been temporarily suspended due to unresolved refund activity and failure to contact our customer support within the given timeframe. 

To lift the suspension, please reach out to our in-game customer support and provide any relevant information or documentation. We'll work with you to resolve this issue as quickly as possible. 

We appreciate your understanding and cooperation.
